channel.title: 135 million players?
channel.description:
Has anyone noticed the sudden increase in the number of players? Last year is was over 9 million, this year it is 135 million?
It's amazing how you can BUY a place in the guiness book of records and a position in the top 100 companies to work for.
Based on current player growth, and factoring in the price of a curly wurly in 1972, it is estimated that in 2 years, every person on the planet will have 5 runescape accounts. :D
Someone has one hell of an auto account maker......

item.title: 135 million players?
item.dc:creator: @army_life army_life
item.description:
@army_life wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:19, topic:227859”].
there are other factors such as. people having lives.[/quote]

No way?!?

Read full topic

item.title: 135 million players?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

There are about 100k players online when you check, but those aren’t the same during the day. Say that everyone plays from 12 till 1 pm in their local time. That would mean that there would be 2.4 million players (did I calculate that right? I took 24 timezones). Ofcourse it’s a really rough calculation, because people play longer then 1 hour a day.

thats not a smart logic.
That would mean everyone would get off and on at the same time. and exactly 100k people.
there are other factors such as. people having lives.

Read full topic

item.title: 135 million players?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yeah i’ve made at least 60+ accounts for autoing… I’m sure many other have as well.

Used to have about 10 running a night, and they’d last about a week so I’d have to make another 10.

item.title: 135 million players?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:15, topic:227859"][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=299469.msg2483895#msg2483895 date=1223697826]

Jagex are one fucking liars.

Name a free MMORPG whit more the 9m active players.

there isn’t one. he isn’t lying.
135 mil registered accounts. Not players.
probably more like 300k players. I mean don’t you think there would be issues with the amount of space, and that they would be filthy fucking rich if 10% were members.
[/quote]

They said that around 6million active accounts that login at least once per two weeks.[/quote]
You didn’t read what I said. 300k players. that could mean 100 accounts online for one player autoing

Read full topic

One friend tells his friend and those friends tell those friends, etc. It adds up.[/quote]
i beleive thats called exponential growth
